info.name: Web
info.description: Manage profile page and web stuff on an omg.lol address

request.description: Retrieve web content and information for an address

response.name: Retrieve web page content
response.body:
{
    "request": {
        "status_code": 200,
        "success": true
    },
    "response": {
        "message": "Here is the web content for foobar.",
        "content": "{profile-picture}

# Foo Bar

| Pronouns: they/them
| Occupation: [Crop Trust](https://www.croptrust.org) 
| Location: Svalbard

--- Bio ---

One thing about me is I once spilled coffee on a production server.

--- Profile Items ---

- [Twitter](https://twitter.com)
- [Instagram](https://instagram.com)
- [Mastodon](https://social.lol)
- [Buy Me a Coffee](https://buymeacoffee.com) <small>(just don’t tell the server)</small>
- https://geotastic.net/foobar
",
        "type": "profile",
        "theme": "default",
        "css": "",
        "head": "",
        "verified": "1",
        "pfp": "foobar.jpg",
        "metadata": "{"title":"","description":""}",
        "branding": "default"
, "modified": "1692841794"
   }
}
